data.title: Health News Brief: Budget Cuts, Rising Measles, and Medical Advancements
data.summary: The Trump administration proposes significant budget cuts affecting health and research sectors. Texas reports 683 measles cases amid nationwide outbreaks. Medical device demand boosts Stryker's earnings. The FDA reviews weight-loss drugs, while Neuralink's device for speech restoration gains breakthrough status. Thailand faces its first anthrax death in decades.

data.title: Scientists achieve breakthrough in eye movement detection technology
data.summary: Eye tracking plays a critical role in the latest virtual and augmented reality headsets and is an important technology in the entertainment industry, scientific research, medical and behavioral sciences, automotive driving assistance and industrial engineering.

data.title: USC and Autobahn Labs team up to advance breakthrough drug research
data.summary: USC has embarked on a collaboration with Autobahn Labs, an accelerator for early-stage drug discovery, to identify and advance cutting-edge scientific findings into new therapies - with a special focus on critical unmet medical needs.

data.title: Breakthrough In Growing Lip Cells In The Lab Could Help Develop Medical Treatments
data.summary: More than paying lip service, the cells may offer new opportunities to research and treat various lip conditions

data.title: 3D-printed femurs may enhance biomechanical studies
data.summary: Researchers at UT Southwestern Medical Center have developed a breakthrough three-dimensional (3D) printing technique for generating realistic models of the human femur that could make it easier and less expensive to conduct biomechanical research.

data.title: Northern Ontario Angels presents the Cancer Research Breakthrough Forum
data.summary: This forum has been curated to captivate medical professionals and potential investors with a keen interest in cutting-edge medtech from Northern Ontario

data.title: New cloned rhesus monkey highlights limits of cloning
data.summary: Scientists have cloned the first rhesus monkey, a breakthrough that could help advance medical research but has drawn criticism from an animal welfare group.

data.title: Harry Perkins Institute on the cusp of medical breakthrough with 3D printed heart valve
data.summary: A Nedlands research institute is developing a 3D printed heart valve.

data.title: Multiple drug targets for the treatment of influenza identified using AI program
data.summary: Poolbeg Pharma, a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focusing on infectious and other prevalent diseases with a high unmet medical need, announces a significant breakthrough in its world first influenza Artificial Intelligence ('AI') Programme with CytoReason.

data.title: Medical breakthrough allows patients to tap iPad screen with their thoughts
data.summary: A company called Synchron is conducting clinical trials on a brain implant that will allow patients to send messages to an iPhone or iPad from their brain
